alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued March 13 at 1:47AM EDT until March 13 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen.
info.instruction: Persons are urged to stay indoors until conditions improve. If you must go outside, dress in layers. Several layers of clothes will keep you warmer than a single heavy coat. Cover exposed skin to reduce your risk of frostbite or hypothermia. Gloves, a scarf, and a hat will keep you from losing your body heat. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.
